translations.source: 除尘系统确保排放达到环保标准。
translations.target: The dust collection system ensures emissions meet environmental compliance standards.

translations.source: 生产调度中心协调各工序运行。
translations.target: The production scheduling center coordinates the operation of each process.

translations.source: 质检中心负责对焦炭产品进行质量检测。
translations.target: The quality inspection center is responsible for quality testing of coke products.

translations.source: 电气系统为全厂设备提供可靠电力。
translations.target: The electrical system provides reliable power for all plant equipment.

translations.source: 仪表自控系统实现生产过程的自动化管理。
translations.target: The instrumentation and control system enables automated management of the production process.

translations.source: 安全管理制度是安全生产的基本保障。
translations.target: The safety management system is the fundamental safeguard for safe production.

translations.source: 性能考核验证工厂的设计指标是否达标。
translations.target: Performance assessment verifies whether the plant's design specifications are met.
